1551170.name: Fantasy Grounds - FG Town & Cityscapes Map Pack
1551170.description:
This product requires Fantasy Grounds Unity

FG Town & Cityscapes Map Pack

Town & Cityscapes Art Package brings hundreds of hand-drawn images to create your own renderings of classic fantasy civilizations and settlements. Town & Cityscapes offers unprecedented freedom and flexibility in creating handout style illustrations of castles atop cliffs and mountains to farmlands and seaside trading towns; the only restriction is your own imagination. Images in this art package have been divided into specific planes of view for ease of use and interaction with other elements. With foreground, two middle ground planes, and background elements, creation with perspective in mind becomes much more intuitive.
This pack includes the following items:
  • Nearly 300 environmental images of skies, clouds, mountains, hills, rocks, trees, and so much more
  • Over 350 images of buildings, bridges, boats, and other constructed elements
  • Many foreground and decorative images
  • Several pre-created images of settlements constructed with this art package and more
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Joshua Watmough
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset. Requires Fantasy Grounds Unity
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
